hymn.title: I'm in Christ, now rejoicing
hymn.category: Assurance and Joy of Salvation—Being in Christ

layout.singingstanza: I'm in Christ, now re -- joic -- ing— From old Ad -- am I am free! All old things are be -- com -- ing Both new and heav -- en -- ly! I'm tast -- ing and en -- joy -- ing Life and peace and lib -- er -- ty! Praise God! I'm in Christ e -- ter -- nal -- ly!

lyrics.stanza: I'm in Christ, now rejoicing— From old Adam I am free! All old things are becoming Both new and heavenly! (Praise God!) I'm tasting and enjoying Life and peace and liberty! Praise God! I'm in Christ eternally!
